Old Testament Leaders

New Testament

  • Apostles
  • Bishops/Pastors/Overseers/Elders

Implications for Believers Today

  1. Jesus turned the leadership model upside down. Matt 20:25 Heb 1:1-3
  2. New Testament leaders are given roles, not titles.
  3. Local churches are instructed to have qualified overseers. 1 Peter 5:2-7
